pr_title: GEODE-8547: Added impacts to show missing disk-stores

timeline.bodyText: I believe you don't need this boolean. If no servers, missingRegions will be null, otherwise, it's empty or has data
timeline.author: jinmeiliao
jinmeiliao

timeline.bodyText: instead of suppress the warning, just don't assign it to a variable
timeline.author: jinmeiliao

timeline.bodyText: I believe you can just create a region without the diskstore, the same problem would still manifest. Make the test simpler
timeline.author: jinmeiliao

timeline.bodyText: you also don't need to add data and do rebalance. Maybe add a comment in your test making it clear that you are starting a stale locator first (locator 1 shutdown before locator0, and now you are starting locator 1 first), locator 1 won't start properly until a diskstore on locator 0 is revoked
timeline.author: jinmeiliao

timeline.bodyText: this variable is not used anymore.
timeline.author: jinmeiliao

timeline.bodyText: actually you can get rid of this variable and inline this too, to make it symetric.
timeline.author: jinmeiliao

timeline.message: GEODE-8547: Added impacts to show missing disk-stores
